content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello, Yi-Nuo Wang. It's a pleasure to meet you. I understand that you are interested in renting my apartment in Magdeburg. Let's discuss the rental price. What would you consider fair for this newly built, unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your time and the opportunity to discuss the rental price of your apartment in Magdeburg. content: As the landlord, I am open to negotiation. I would like to start with a price that reflects the quality and location of the apartment. I would like to ask for 1,200 Euros per month. Is this within your budget?

content: Thank you for your offer, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate the starting point for our negotiation. content: Certainly, Yi-Nuo Wang. I am willing to negotiate. How much lower would you like to propose?

content: Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Mister Schmidt. I would like to propose 1,150 Euros per month. This would be a more comfortable price for me, considering my budget and the current market rates. Would you consider this offer?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Your offer of 1,150 Euros per month is acceptable to me, Yi-Nuo Wang. I agree to the price of 1,150 Euros! Let's proceed with the lease agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Wonderful news, Mister Schmidt! I am very pleased to hear that we have reached an agreement on the rental price of 1,150 Euros per month. content: No, Yi-Nuo Wang, there is nothing specific I would like to discuss regarding the lease agreement at this time. Once the lease is drafted and signed, I am confident that we will have a positive landlord-tenant relationship. Thank you for your professionalism during this negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt, for your professionalism as well. I am looking forward to a smooth process and a long-term relationship with you as my landlord.
